name: garoon-mark-all-as-read
description: Garoonのすべての通知を既読にするクローム拡張アプリ。

scripts.clean: npm run clean-js && npm run clean-css
scripts.js: npm run clean-js && npm run compile
scripts.js-dev: npm run clean-js && npm run compile-dev
scripts.css: npm run clean-css && node-sass --include-path app/scss -o app/css app/scss/cs.scss
scripts.all-dev: npm run clean && npm run compile-dev && npm run css
scripts.all: npm run clean-js && npm run compile && npm run css

author: oldergod
